item.title: All languages need first class tuples - RobG3D
item.description: Over time I've moved more and more away from creating classes for data structures in Python, a 'best practice' habit I brought over from C#. It is silly in a dynamically typed language. There's nothing more clear about: for entry in chartdata: ...
item.dc:creator: Rob Galanakis

item.title: Arduino Interrupts and Timers | Charlie Brown - carbonatethis
item.description: Inside an ISR you can use any normal code you might use in the main loop, but best practice is to keep your ISR as short (quick) as possible, usually just increment a value to keep track of the number of interrupts. Notice that our interrupt ...
item.dc:creator: carbonrobot

item.title: LINQ to Twitter Runs On Xamarin.iOS - Geekswithblogs.net
item.description: You'll see the New Project window below. SNAGHTMLf7b664f. Under Installed Templates, Visual C#, iOS, iPhone, you see some new templates. Select HelloWorld Application, name the project L2TDemo, specify any file location you want, ...
item.dc:creator: Joe Mayo

item.title: משרות הייטק - SeeV
item.description: משרות הייטק הכי חמות שיש בהייטק נמצאות אצלנו. SeeV – משרות הייטק במגוון חברות, מסטארט-אפים ועד חברות מובילות במשק.
